gobblin.source.extractor.hadoop

Class HadoopFileInputSource<S,D,K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.AbstractSource<S,D>
      • gobblin.source.extractor.hadoop.HadoopFileInputSource<S,D,K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - output schema type
    D - output data record type
    K - key type expected by the FileInputFormat
    V - value type expected by the FileInputFormat
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source<S,D>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HadoopTextInputSource

    public abstract class HadoopFileInputSource<S,D,K,V>
extends AbstractSource<S,D>
    An implementation of Source that uses a Hadoop FileInputFormat to get a FileSplit per Extractor return by getExtractor(WorkUnitState) and a RecordReader to read the FileSplit.

    This class can read either keys of type # or values of type # supported by the given FileInputFormat, through the property FILE_INPUT_READ_KEYS_KEY. It will read keys if the property is set to true, otherwise it will read values. By default, it will read values through the given FileInputFormat.

    A concrete implementation of this class should implement getFileInputFormat(State, Configuration) and getExtractor(WorkUnitState, RecordReader, FileSplit, boolean), which returns a HadoopFileInputExtractor that needs an concrete implementation.

      • getFileInputFormat

        protected FileInputFormat<K,V> getFileInputFormat(State state,
                                                  Configuration configuration)
        Get a FileInputFormat instance used to get FileSplits and a RecordReader for every FileSplit.

        This default implementation simply creates a new instance of a FileInputFormat class specified using the configuration property FILE_INPUT_FORMAT_CLASS_KEY.

        Parameters:
        state - a State object carrying configuration properties
        configuration - a Hadoop Configuration object carrying Hadoop configurations
        Returns:
        a FileInputFormat instance

      • getExtractor

        protected abstract HadoopFileInputExtractor<S,D,K,V> getExtractor(WorkUnitState workUnitState,
                                                                  RecordReader<K,V> recordReader,
                                                                  FileSplit fileSplit,
                                                                  boolean readKeys)
        Get a HadoopFileInputExtractor instance.
        Parameters:
        workUnitState - a WorkUnitState object carrying Gobblin configuration properties
        recordReader - a Hadoop RecordReader object used to read input records
        fileSplit - the FileSplit to read input records from
        readKeys - whether the OldApiHadoopFileInputExtractor should read keys of type #; by default values of type #>V> are read.
        Returns:
        a HadoopFileInputExtractor instance
